content.text:
Let me help you solve this building block challenge by analyzing the main target image and the block dictionary.

Analysis of Target Image:
- Total Blocks: 6 blocks
- Layers: 3 layers
- Colors: Green, Orange/Red, Yellow
- Structure: 
  1. Bottom layer: Green base block and orange/red triangular/angled block
  2. Middle layer: Orange/red cylindrical block
  3. Top layer: Green tall block and red/orange block with a curved/hole section, topped with two yellow semi-circular blocks

Block Selection from Dictionary:
1. Green base block (index 5)
2. Green tall block (index 6)
3. Orange/red cylindrical block (index 9)
4. Red/orange curved block with hole (index 1)
5. Yellow semi-circular blocks (index 10)
6. Orange/red triangular/angled block (index 13)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 5 (green base)
    Step2: Move block with index 9 (orange cylinder) on top of green base
    Step3: Move block with index 13 (orange triangle) next to cylinder
    Step4: Move block with index 6 (green tall block) on top of base
    Step5: Move block with index 1 (red curved block) next to tall block
    Step6: Move block with index 10 (yellow semi-circular blocks) on top of red block
}
